function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of support in times of crisis","Impact":"Difficulty in managing contagious disease outbreaks and other crises","Mitigation":"Building broader and stronger support bases, establishing partnerships with supportive foundations","Technologies":"N/A","People":"PCA governance authorities","Owner":"PCA governance authorities"},{"Description":"Reliance on external funding sources","Impact":"Financial vulnerability and potential limitations in responding to contagious disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Diversifying funding base, leveraging partnerships with CSR donors and supportive foundations","Technologies":"N/A","People":"PCA governance authorities","Owner":"PCA governance authorities"},{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Health and safety risks to staff, volunteers, and visitors","Mitigation":"Implementing effective disease control measures, awareness programs, and infrastructure improvements","Technologies":"Disease monitoring technology, contact tracing technology","People":"Staff, volunteers, visitors","Owner":"PCA governance authorities"}]}
